snippet: In carrying out limited airstrikes, the United States is trying to contain the threat posed by Islamic militants but not break their hold on northern and western Iraq.
abstract: News analysis; United States is trying to contain threat posed by Islamic militants in northern and western Iraq by carrying out limited airstrikes; says formation of government in Iraq is critical in fighting Islamic State in Iraq and Syria militants.
lead_paragraph: In carrying out limited airstrikes, the United States is trying to contain the threat posed by Islamic militants but not break their hold on northern and western Iraq.

headline.main: As ISIS Militants Exert Their Control, U.S. Pursues a Military Middle Road
headline.print_headline: U.S. Pursues a Military Middle Road in Iraq

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
